long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Google Chrome extension automatically fills out and submits Columbia uni/password prompts. Eg: if you visit courseworks.columbia.edu, the extension will automatically click "Log In", fill out the password prompt and hit "Login" for you, so you'll end up on the logged-in page without any typing.

Disclaimer: the extension saves your password locally on your computer, so use at your own risk (eg, make sure your computer is secured and password protected).

Changelog
- Version 1.8 (Jan 24, 2016) - updated to auto-click the new "Log In" button on courseworks/welcome/
- Version 1.7 (Jan 17, 2014) - updated to work for Courseworks again (cas.columbia.edu added to "allowed sites")
